projects.name: DimeDefender
projects.description: A security-focused web app designed to help users safeguard sensitive data by analyzing exposure levels and providing action steps to mitigate risks.

projects.name: MpoxMap
projects.description: An interactive map-based dashboard tracking the spread of Mpox cases globally, providing visualizations and historical data insights for public health awareness.

projects.name: UWFE Dashboard
projects.description: A custom telemetry dashboard developed for the University of Waterloo Formula Electric team to enhance driver experience with real-time car diagnostics and data visualization.

projects.name: GameWave
projects.description: A platform that connects gamers with similar interests, helping users create communities, find teammates, and participate in gaming events and tournaments.
